sections.heading: of Agriculture; cooperate with United States Department of Agriculture
sections.text: The director is hereby authorized to cooperate with the United States Department of Agriculture for the exchange and cross certification of employees or inspectors to implement the Nebraska Meat and Poultry Inspection Law.SourceL

54-1915.Director of Agriculture; cooperate with United States Department of Agriculture.

The director is hereby authorized to cooperate with the United States Department of Agriculture for the exchange and cross certification of employees or inspectors to implement the Nebraska Meat and Poultry Inspection Law.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 449, ยง 15, p. 1520;Laws 2021, LB324, ยง 9.
